notes: The 'type' field is mandatory and must be one of: BankTransfer, MobileMoney, Manual
For BankTransfer: provider and account are required. Account must have rib and accountHolder
For MobileMoney: provider is required. Either phoneNumber or accountCode (or both) must be provided
For Manual: mode is required and must be CHEQUE or ESPECES
BankTransfer and Manual default to: isAutomatic=false, requiresApproval=true
XAF is the currency for CEMAC zone (Cameroon, Gabon, Congo, CAR, Chad, Equatorial Guinea)

queryExamples.description: PostgreSQL query examples for payment_method JSONB column

queries.name: Find all bank transfer payment terms
Find all mobile money payments for MTN
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM partner_insurers.payment_terms WHERE payment_method->>'type' = 'MobileMoney' AND payment_method->>'provider' = 'MOOV_MONEY';

queries.name: Find all payments in XAF currency
Find bank transfers for specific bank (BGFI)
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM partner_insurers.payment_terms WHERE payment_method->>'type' = 'BankTransfer' AND payment_method->>'provider' = 'BGFI';

queries.name: Find mobile money with specific phone number
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM partner_insurers.payment_terms WHERE payment_method->>'type' = 'MobileMoney' AND payment_method->>'phoneNumber' = '+237677123456';
